basics.name: Nguyen thi Quynh Thong
basics.label:
Specialties:
- Working experience in senior/ managerial levels for famous national and international Conglomerates. 
- Strong and professional in establishment and implementation of diverse function of HR 
management: Organization structure and re-structure, Compensation and benefits, 
Recruitment, Training and development, Talent management, HR and Administration regulation and policies. 
- Involve and implement important and challenging international projects. 
- Member of AITC HR Club
- BOM member and Deputy Director of C&B Group - HRA (Human resource Association) 
- Commitment & Passion for result
- Cooperative & Supportive
- Positive and critical thinking 
- Tact and diplomacy

work.company: F.I.T Group, No 1 Nguyen Huy Tuong street, Thanh Xuan district, Ha Noi, Vietnam
work.desc:
F.I.T Group Joint Stock Company was established in 2007, operating as investor as well as active in investment advisory field and financial services. 
After 10 years of development, F.I.T has become a powerful investment group with total equity up to 3,760 billion dong, total assets over 4,339 billion dong and more than 3000 staffs at 10 subsidiaries and associated companies located in key provinces nationwide. F.I.T Group’s products are distributed across Vietnam and exported to main global markets.

work.summary: Talent leader - Talent team Vietnam, Laos, Cambodia
